short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Patch holes in GA4 for better reporting. Adds '% of Total' in reports, 'Click to Copy' values, one-click report building and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
